mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.drug_code AS "drugCode", a.drug_name AS "drugName", a.drug_spec AS "drugSpec", a.units AS "units", a.drug_form AS "drugForm", a.toxi_property AS "toxiProperty", a.dose_per_unit AS "dosePerUnit", a.dose_units AS "doseUnits", a.drug_indicator AS "drugIndicator", a.input_code AS "inputCode", a.otc AS "otc", a.limit_class AS "limitClass", a.stop_flag AS "stopFlag", a.entered_datetime AS "enteredDatetime", a.precious_flag AS "preciousFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
